Player History
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 8/24/1986 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Traded from Boston to Los Angeles on 5/3/1989 (Going to LAD: P Jim Corsi. Going to BOS: P Milt Hill, P Frank Castillo, P Mike Walters, P Matt E. Williams)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago on 6/18/1989 (Going to LAD: P Turk Wendell, SS Pat Listach. Going to CHC: P Paul Assenmacher, P Jim Corsi)...
Released by Chicago on 2/2/1990...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/7/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $550,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/17/1990...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/13/1991, off David West (NYM)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/13/1991, off David West (NYM)...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/13/1991, off David West (NYM)...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Los Angeles to Toronto on 2/8/1992 (Going to LAD: P Felipe Lira, C Jorge Fabregas, CF Shane Spencer. Going to TOR: P Ken Howell, P Rocky Childress, P Jim Corsi)...
Injured on 5/4/1992 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
